body:
Get in touch: (262) 501-6673 ariamoraine@gmail.com
***


# HackerSchool Student 
June 2012 to December 2012

### Android Applications
* Seasonal Food -  Uses AsyncTask to implement web scraping and displays certain data depending on users location and current month. Published to google app store.
* Knitting Counter - Implements two different counters, and saves users count when destroyed and restarted. Published to google app store. 
* Tip Calculator -  Uses onClickListeners to watch for user input. 
* Fresh Mid - Takes the users first and last names and randomly generates two middle names from two different stringArrays. 

### Python Projects
* Hangman - A console text based remake of hangman. 
* Pickel talk - Local packet server. Using sockets, threading, and pickel.
* Gobble - A two player desktop game with pygame.



# Taste. 
cakesbytaste.com
Pastry chef/cake decorator - 2011 to 2012
Duties include: 
Mixing and baking all batters and cakes, icing cupcakes, making cake pops, decorating cakes, performing weekly inventory and putting together order sheets. 



# Camp Unirondack
www.unirondack.org
Co-Kitchen Manager - Summer of 2010 and 2011
Head Baker - Summer of 2009
Kitchen Managers Duties included: 
* Interviewing and hiring all kitchen staff. 
* Ordering and maintaining kitchen equipment. 
* Creating all menus for meat eating, vegetarian, vegan, gluten free, lactose intolerant, and other allergies. 
* Ordering all food. 
* Inventorying entire kitchen twice a week. 
* Maintaining a sanitary kitchen. 
* Training all kitchen staff on proper health code. 
* Serving three hot meals a day for over 100 people. 
* Maintaining a budget.  
Head Bakers Duties Included:
* Preparing all deserts including vegan and gluten free. 
* Maintaining workstation. 
* Creating dessert menu for each coming week. 
* Working within a budget. 
* Maintaining inventories.




# Song Of The Morning Yoga Retreat Center 
www.goldenlotus.org 
October 2007 to October 2008
Duties included: 
* Preparing lodging for guests. 
* Checking guests in and out. 
* Aiding kitchen manager to stock the kitchen. 
* Preparing desserts. 
* Helping to prepare dinners and breakfasts. 
* Making sure all guests were comfortable. 
* Maintaining a sense of atmosphere for all guests.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Aria Moraine
tagline: Pastry chef turned programmer. Working on becoming the best Android programmer out there. A self proclaimed autodidact.
